remarks: Extend class notation with a one-to-one onto ( ~ mapd1o ), order-preserving ( ~ mapdord ) map, called a projectivity (definition of projectivity in [Baer] p. 40), from subspaces of vector space H to those subspaces of the dual space having functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2015.)
